text:
(MENAFN Press) MarketStudyReport.com is pleased to introduce a report by Value Market Research  Global Lignin Market By Products (Lignosulfonate Kraft Lignin and Others) By Applications (Concrete Additives Animal Feed Dyestuff Others) And By Geography 
Access  report now.  
Global lignin market is estimated to grow at CAGR 2.7% for the forecast period from 2014 to 2021. Types applications and geography segment this report. Segmentations by types include lignosulphonates kraft lignin and others consisting organosolv lignin. Global lignin market report covers applications such as concrete additives animal feed dyestuff and others. Other lignin include applications like fertilizers and pesticides thermoplastic polymers binders and resins inks varnishes and paints cosmetics and absorbents. Concrete additives account the largest application share in the global lignin market. Animal feed is fastest growing application market. 

Lignin is a lignocellulosic biomass component and by-product of pulp industry. Available in abundance lignin is the only recognized natural biological aromatic polymer. This polymer is competent of producing different straight chain cyclic and aromatic chemicals. Value added applications of lignin could be grouped as energy macromolecules and aromatics. Aromatics and macromolecules based lignin derivatives are the most demanded commodities in the market.

North America is the leading geography followed by Europe. Asia Pacific is the fastest growing region and it is expected to emerge as biggest market over the forecast period. Countries like USA Germany India China and Brazil are the drivers for regional growth. The market is estimated to reach USD 1323.1 million by 2021. The global lignin market will increase by 19.27% by 2021 over 2014. 
 
This 250 pages report offers:  
1. Market definition for the Lignin products along with identification of key drivers and restraints for the market.
2. Market analysis for the Global Lignin Products Market with region and country specific assessments and competition analysis on a global and regional scale.
3. Identification of factors instrumental in changing the market scenarios rising prospective opportunities and identification of key companies which can influence the market on a global and regional scale.
4. Extensively researched competitive landscape section with profiles of major companies along with their strategic initiatives and market shares.
5. Identification and analysis of the Macro and Micro factors that affect the Global Lignin Products market on both global and regional scale.
6. A comprehensive list of key market players along with the analysis of their current strategic interests and key financial information.
